name: deletePortingOrder
description: Request the cancellation of a porting order.

$ul: **data**
**activation_settings**
**activation_status**: Activation status
**fast_port_eligible**: Indicates whether this porting order is eligible for FastPort
**foc_datetime_actual**: ISO 8601 formatted Date/Time of the FOC date
**foc_datetime_requested**: ISO 8601 formatted Date/Time requested for the FOC date
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**end_user**
**admin**
**account_number**: The authorized person's account number with the current service provider
**auth_person_name**: Name of person authorizing the porting order
**billing_phone_number**: Billing phone number associated with these phone numbers
**business_identifier**: European business identification number. Applicable only in the European Union
**entity_name**: Person Name or Company name requesting the port
**pin_passcode**: PIN/passcode possibly required by the old service provider for extra verification
**tax_identifier**: European tax identification number. Applicable only in the European Union
**location**
**administrative_area**: State, province, or similar of billing address
**country_code**: ISO3166-1 alpha-2 country code of billing address
**extended_address**: Second line of billing address
**locality**: City or municipality of billing address
**postal_code**: Postal Code of billing address
**street_address**: First line of billing address
**id**: Uniquely identifies this porting order
**misc**

**new_billing_phone_number**: New billing phone number for the remaining numbers. Used in case the current billing phone number is being ported to Telnyx. This will be set on your account with your current service provider and should be one of the numbers remaining on that account.

**remaining_numbers_action**: Remaining numbers can be either kept with their current service provider or disconnected. 'new_billing_telephone_number' is required when 'remaining_numbers_action' is 'keep'.
**type**: A port can be either 'full' or 'partial'. When type is 'full' the other attributes should be omitted.
**old_service_provider_ocn**: Identifies the old service provider
**phone_number_configuration**
**connection_id**: identifies the connection to set on the numbers when ported
**emergency_address_id**: identifies the emergency address to set on the numbers when ported
**messaging_profile_id**: identifies the messaging profile to set on the numbers when ported
**tags**
**porting_phone_numbers_count**: Count of phone numbers associated with this porting order
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**requirements**: List of documentation requirements for porting numbers.
**status**: Porting order status
**details**: A list of 0 or more details about this porting order's status
**value**: The current status of the porting order
**support_key**: A key to reference this porting order when contacting Telnyx customer support
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**user_feedback**
**user_comment**: A comment related to the customer rating.
**user_rating**: Once an order is ported, cancellation is requested or the request is canceled, the user may rate their experience
**user_reference**: A customer-specified reference number for customer bookkeeping purposes
**webhook_url**
**meta**
**phone_numbers_url**: Link to list all phone numbers
